Posts.Content: Tilley60 wrote: Hi! I am new to this forum. I was diagnosed with invasive her2 positive breast cancer. I've had a complete mastectomy and 2 rounds of chemo. My question is, I'm thinking about discontinueing chemo since I've already had 2 rounds of chemo and a  mastectomy and the cancer was only 2mm  in siz  and negative lymph nodes?  What do you all think? Any advice is greatly appreciated !! Members Log in to post a reply
